values: 报酬；奖励；酬金；悬赏金；赏格；奖品
奖励；奖赏；报酬；赏赐；回报；酬谢；给予回报；给予奖励；给以报酬

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有益的，值得的；有报酬的，报答的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对品德高尚和勤劳的人所给予的奖励。也可指为某事付酬金。
侧重指官方或经正式研究裁决后对有功者或竞赛优胜者所给予的奖励。

word_group.brief_definition: 奖赏系统；奖励制度；奖励体系
物质奖酬；经费报酬；奖金
现金奖赏；现金奖励；金钱上的报酬
丰厚的奖励；丰厚的回报
一个5000美元的报酬；一份5000美元的赏金；一份5000美元的酬金

bilingual.target: 我们应该奖励好的行为。

bilingual.source: She gave me a piece of caramel as a reward.
bilingual.target: 她给了我一块牛奶糖作为奖励。

bilingual.source: The seizer was given a reward for his actions.
bilingual.target: 抓住者因其行为获得了奖励。

bilingual.source: He received a monetary reward for his hard work.
bilingual.target: 他因辛勤工作获得了货币奖励。

bilingual.source: She received a reward for her excellent performance.
bilingual.target: 她因出色的表现获得了奖励。

bilingual.source: Hard work will eventually bring its own reward.
bilingual.target: 努力工作最终会带来自己的奖励。

bilingual.source: The company decided to reward its employees with a bonus.
bilingual.target: 公司决定用奖金来奖励员工。

bilingual.source: She received a reward commensurate with her efforts.
bilingual.target: 她得到了与她的努力相称的奖励。

bilingual.source: The promise of a reward can be a powerful motivation.
bilingual.target: 奖励的承诺可以成为强大的动力。

bilingual.source: We need a new reward system to motivate employees.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个新的奖励制度来激励员工。

yingyinNormal.en: I came to view problems like puzzles that would reward me if I could solve them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我转而把问题看成谜题能解决谜题就可获得奖励。

yingyinNormal.en: You think you deserve a reward for being a good person, that we should celebrate your goodness. Would you like a parade?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认为表现好应该得到奖励，我们应该庆祝你好的表现。你想要个游行吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But if they thought he was, they believed he was, I bet they'd handsomely reward anyone who brought him to them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是他们都觉得他是，他们觉得他是，他们肯定会给把他献上来的人，一笔不小的奖励。

yingyinNormal.en: And when I thought about my challenge, balancing risk and reward, I realized that risk and reward naturally go together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我考虑到自己的挑战，平衡风险和回报时，我意识到风险和回报是共存的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yelena asked, why would the spirits reward Arendelle with a magical queen?
yingyinNormal.zh: 叶莲娜问过为什么精灵会奖赏艾伦戴尔一个魔法女王。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. And does Scabbit reward you for these efforts? Yeah. I have more Pimp Points than any other user.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的。「瞎掰网」有无给予你回报呢？是的，我的「皮条分」比其他任何用户都多。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I don't need a reward. If you guys are trying to think of what honor to bestow upon me, don't need it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我做好事不求回报，你们大家不用绞尽脑汁想给我颁什么奖，不用。

yingyinNormal.en: They tried to put him down, but he was under my command, so I took the blame. Two scars across my back as a reward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们想杀了他，但是他是我的手下，所以我挡下了。我后背上的伤疤就当是纪念了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. Lockhart has made a very strong argument. I am prone to reward this housekeeper the inheritance unless there's anything more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洛克哈特女士的论据很有说服力，我倾向于把画判给给管家，除非有新的证据出现。

yingyinNormal.en: If you ground me the one time that I do something that you don't like, where is my reward for doing something good on all the other days?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果因为我做了一次您不喜欢的事就禁足我，那我在其它日子里做的好事还有什么意义呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, thanks so much. I want to give you a reward for finding him. Oh, no, I couldn't take your money. It's just an honor to meet you. No. No, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总而言之，非常感谢。你帮我找到他我一定要好好酬谢你。不用了，我不能拿你的钱。见到你已经是我的荣幸了。拜托，别客气。

yingyinNormal.en: The things we are striving for are just the bait. Struggling to get them forces us to evolve, and it is this struggle toward personal evolution with others that is the reward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们追求的事情只是诱饵。实现目标的挣扎迫使我们不断发展，正是这些挣扎促进了个人发展，这就是回报。

yingyinNormal.en: I could see that to get the most out of life, one has to take more risk, and that knowing how to appropriately balance risk and reward is essential to having the best life possible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要在生活中有更大的成就，就得冒更多风险，为了过上尽可能好的生活必须知道如何正确地平衡风险和回报。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought very hard about the relationship between risk and reward, and how to manage them. But I couldn't see a path forward that would give me the rewards I wanted without unacceptable risk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我非常努力地思考了风险和回报之间的关系以及管理方法。但我还是看不见有哪条路可以不冒巨大的风险带给我想要的回报。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps I have been a bit harsh on our new garbage boy. He has taken a bold risk and we should reward that, as Chef Gusteau would have. If he wishes to swim in dangerous waters, who are we to deny him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我先前对新来的清洁工太严厉了点，但他大胆面对挑战，我们应该像食神过去做的奖赏他，如果他这么爱冒险，我们不该阻止他。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? He's swimming, giving it all he's got and then three gigantic sharks capture him and he blows them up and dives thousands of feet and gets chased by a monster with huge teeth! He ties this demon to a rock, and what's his reward? He gets to battle an entire jellyfish forest! Now he's with a bunch of sea turtles on the E.A. C and the word is he's headed this way right now to Sydney!
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的? 他追啊追,不顾一切得追，突然三条鲨鱼碰到了他，他炸飞了他们，然后潜到了几千英尺下面又被长着巨大牙齿的怪兽追捕! 他把那个怪兽绑在了岩石上, 他得到了什么奖赏呢? 他和整个水母群战斗! 现在他正和一群海龟在东流上顺着东澳暖流直奔悉尼!

exam_freq_info.chinese: 奖励; 回报; 报酬

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 给予报偿的；令人满足的；有益的

word_family.mean: n. 奖赏；酬劳；奖品；报偿；赏金；报应

sense_info_list.en: something given in recognition of one's service, effort, or achievement
sense_info_list.zh: 奖励; 回报; 报酬

examination_example.sentence: So, the number of buses and bus lanes were increased, and drivers were <highlight>rewarded</highlight> or punished according to the time they took.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，公共汽车和公共汽车车道的数量增加了，司机根据他们（路上）所花的时间得到奖励或惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: Some want to shock, others to draw people into science, or to better <highlight>reward</highlight> those who have made their careers in research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人想让人震惊，有些人想吸引人们投身科学，或者更好地奖励那些以研究为职业的人。

examination_example.sentence: Little <highlight>reward</highlight> accompanies duplication and confirmation of what is already known and believed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重复和确认已知和相信的东西，几乎不会带来回报。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of money that is offered to sb for helping the police to find a criminal or for finding sth that is lost

word_usage.usage: reward多用作及物动词，后接名词或代词作宾语，常用表达有reward sb for sth.或reward one's sth.;reward可用于被动结构，但不可以接双宾语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指某人因做了好事或有益的事而得到“回报”，后面不能接双宾语。如果要说以何为报酬，须加with短语。
指正式或官方颁发、授予，也可以指法庭等裁决给予，强调“把......东西奖给或授予某人”时，后接双宾语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 给予报偿的；令人满足的；有益的

word_family.mean: n. 奖赏；酬劳；奖品；报偿；赏金；报应

sense_info_list.en: something given in recognition of one's service, effort, or achievement

examination_example.sentence: From Facebook to Instagram, the medium refocuses our attention on videos and images, <highlight>rewarding</highlight> emotional appeals—'like' buttons—over rational ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从Facebook到Instagram，媒体将我们的注意力重新集中在视频和图片上，奖励情感诉求——“喜欢”按钮，而不是理性诉求。

examination_example.sentence: I'm talking about those who consistently believe they deserve special treatment and generous <highlight>rewards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我说的是那些始终认为自己应该得到特殊待遇和丰厚奖励的人。

examination_example.sentence: They'd then go further to explain the specific, and objective, criteria the employee must meet to receive their desired <highlight>rewards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，他们会进一步解释员工必须满足的具体、客观的标准才能获得他们想要的奖励。

sense_info_list.en: a fair return for good or bad behavior

examination_example.sentence: In order to achieve a successful outcome or <highlight>reward</highlight>, some level of risk is almost always essential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要想获得成功的结果或回报，一定程度的风险几乎总是必不可少的。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of money that is offered to someone for helping the police to find a criminal or for finding something that is lost

examination_example.sentence: People whose neural(神经的)<highlight>reward</highlight> centers were more active when they won money were also more likely to be among the group of liars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些在赢钱时神经奖励中心更活跃的人也更有可能是说谎者。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 给予报偿的；令人满足的；有益的

word_family.mean: n. 奖赏；酬劳；奖品；报偿；赏金；报应

sense_info_list.en: something given in recognition of one's service; effort; or achievement

examination_example.sentence: It is offering a big <highlight>reward</highlight> to anyone who helps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它向任何提供帮助的人提供高额报酬。

examination_example.sentence: One reason is that society <highlight>rewards</highlight> people who are thin and healthy-looking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个原因是社会奖励那些瘦瘦的、看起来健康的人。

examination_example.sentence: The doer of a good deed can feel spiritually <highlight>rewarded</highlight> even when they gain no concrete benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做好事的人即使没有得到具体的好处，也能获得精神上的回报。

sense_info_list.en: a fair return for good or bad behavior

examination_example.sentence: Golden Rule No. 10 for a good life is that kindness toward others tends to be <highlight>rewarded</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美好生活的第十条黄金法则是，善待他人往往会得到回报。

examination_example.sentence: It is a magic tool to bring big <highlight>rewards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个能带来巨大回报的神奇工具。

examination_example.sentence: Procter & Gamble has a "Corporate Innovation Fund" which offers big <highlight>rewards</highlight> for high-risk ideas that succeed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宝洁公司有一个“企业创新基金”，为成功的高风险创意提供高额奖励。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of money that is offered to someone for helping the police to find a criminal or for finding something that is lost

examination_example.sentence: The family is offering a £5,000 <highlight>reward</highlight> for the safe return of the dog after launching a social media campaign.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在发起社交媒体活动后，这家人将为这只狗的安全回归提供5000英镑的奖励。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指应得的报酬、奖金，不强调荣誉。
指授予奖章或奖金，常表荣誉。
常指因某事或比赛而赢得的奖品或奖金，也含荣誉的意味。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 给予报偿的；令人满足的；有益的

word_family.mean: n. 奖赏；酬劳；奖品；报偿；赏金；报应

sense_info_list.en: something given in recognition of one's service, effort, or achievement

examination_example.sentence: To many people, saving lives is part of the job but styling hair is an extra and should be <highlight>rewarded</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对很多人来说，拯救生命是工作的一部分，但美发是额外的工作，应该得到奖励。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers then tested how the monkeys combined— or added — the symbols to get the <highlight>reward</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，研究人员测试了这些猴子是如何结合或添加这些符号来获得奖励的。

sense_info_list.en: a fair return for good or bad behavior

examination_example.sentence: The most <highlight>rewarding</highlight> day for our group was project day, when all the efforts we put into collecting the items finally came together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我们团队来说，最有收获的一天是项目日，在那一天，我们为收集这些物品所付出的努力终于汇集到了一起。

examination_example.sentence: For many who made it to Dawson, however, the <highlight>rewards</highlight> were worth the difficult trip.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，对于许多成功到达道森的人来说，这趟艰难的旅程是值得的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 奖励; 奖赏; 回报

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 给予报偿的；令人满足的；有益的

word_family.mean: n. 奖赏；酬劳；奖品；报偿；赏金；报应

sense_info_list.zh: 奖励; 奖赏; 回报

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>reward</highlight> (奖励), Mrs. Smith gave Vicky a dog biscuit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为奖励，史密斯夫人给了维基一块狗饼干。

examination_example.sentence: People and animals are eager to know things because getting that information means a <highlight>reward</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人和动物都渴望知道一些事情，因为得到这些信息就意味着有奖励。

examination_example.sentence: Besides the activities, some schools <highlight>reward</highlight> (奖励) their teachers for their efforts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了这些活动，一些学校还对老师们的付出进行了奖励。
